mil3.5.8:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.5.8:0.3_0: Because of their fruits of development.
mil3.5.8:1.2_0: “Anyone called a dragon who has made the unskillful, or the skillful deeds?”
mil3.5.8:1.3_0: “If they follow one another, they wouldn’t have, shadow that?”
mil3.5.8:1.4_0: “But sir, can you give to those deeds who do in this way?”
mil3.5.8:1.5_0: “We can’t give you kinds of legal procedure, great king, or do what you say.”
mil3.5.8:2.2_0: “What do you think, great king? Would these trees are not possible to show fruits of fruit, or to have the fruits of this.”
mil3.5.8:2.4_0: “In the same way, when they are cut off and cut off, they don’t give away to any legal procedure to be done by the Buddha, or they think: ‘This is mine.’
mil3.5.8:4.1_0: Eight fruits of deeds, and energy.
